name: Clown Rpg
description:
Have you ever thought "I want to be a clown, and fight a whole bunch of people with swords,  gun's and Fist!" well than this is the game for you!

Take control of ClownMan the funny clwon as him and his 2 friends Edgy clown and Cool Criminal Clown battle thier way to play the ultimate prank on the mayor of an unsuspecting town!

Game has many intersting and unique mechanics like: you fight enemies, and you use either Funny Jokes, Cool Tricks, or Nice things for yourr friends to further your goals!

Don't worry, some people will like you and not be scared of you!

[NOT A VIRUS] Promise 100% guarantee! if you computer stops working when you play this game comment that it did and you will get a FULL refund!!!!
